The claim made by Charlie Crist in his c: 2. The claim is based on a May 5, 2014, story in the Tampa Tribune that detailed a projected increase in property taxes municipalities contribute to public schools.
The property tax rate: known as the Required Local Effort, was set at 5.18 mills in 2013 and remained the same in 2014.
